column1: Narrator : The tiny island is covered in grass. Trees, hedges and bushes are neatly aligned further in the island.
Narrator : A row of fruit trees is not far from CAPITAINE.
column2: Narrator : CAPITAINE wanders into a small orchard.
column3: Narrator : CAPITAINE is surrounded by a handful of fruit trees.

column7: Narrator : A small chicken house is nestled between bushes.

column9: Choice : Let’s go see the hens.

column3: PlayerSpeak : Some juicy apricots and ripe apricots!
column4: PlayerSpeak : Looks like animals ate everything

column2: OtherSpeak : I saw you wandering around my apple trees.
OtherSpeak : I bet you’re a good person, anyone else would’ve stolen some fruits, they all do.
Choice : I just try to do the right thing.
OtherSpeak : And what’s your name, friend?

column4: OtherSpeak : Nothing I can do mate, sorry.

column8: OtherSpeak : It looks like I don’t have any fruits anymore.

column3: OtherSpeak : Someone’s not in the mood to talk…
column5: OtherSpeak : I’ve been there too, nobody deserves to starve.

column7: OtherSpeak : I made a bit too much, but you can keep it!

column1: Narrator : The trees are now empty of fruit

column2: PlayerSpeak : Let’s bail before someone sees us!
column3: PlayerSpeak : Nothing much to see anymore...
OtherSpeak : There’s that THIEF back here!
Choice : What are you gonna do?

column1: OtherSpeak : Oh it was probably one of these wolves.
column3: OtherSpeak : I’ll take my apples back.

column1: OtherSpeak : But get out of my yard, now!

column3: Narrator : The farmer is collapsed on the ground.
column4: Narrator : The farmer died… CAPITAINE sees his farm not far from here.

column1: OtherSpeak : Keep talking, you stinking thief!

column5: Choice : Let’s check around the farm.

column1: OtherSpeak : 15 gold coins and I’ll let it slide.

column5: OtherSpeak : Then pay with your blood!

column2: OtherSpeak : You don’t even have enough...
OtherSpeak : Get out of my sight, you rat.
column4: OtherSpeak : You’ll regret this decision, criminal!
